description:
After Niche carries the wounded and stunned Lag back to the Bee Hive, the Letter Bee finally begins to piece the puzzle together. Now he knows what's happened to Gauche, why the Marauders are so focused on stealing mail and the actual intent of the group controlling both, Reverse. However, when he's forbidden to reveal the truth, Lag is soon forced out of the artificial sunlight and back into the world of perpetual night. And soon Reverse's plot to take down the Letter Bees and overthrow the Amberground government begins to accelerate. If things weren't already bad enough, the giant insect creatures called gaichuu are apparently evolving into something new; there may be traitors working within the Hive; and Niche's sister, who's definitely not human friendly, shows up to turn family drama into a full-scale siege! It all spells serious trouble for the Letter Bees, but if anyone can weather the storms and gloom of night, Lag and his team are the ones who'll deliver.

(Source: FUNimation)

tags.name: Super Power

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/asadercover)

Best known for his fantasy series [Tegami Bachi](https://anilist.co/manga/31709/).
He's a Japanese musician and singer-songwriter from Tokyo.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/芝美奈子)

Noted for her character designs on [Black Butler](https://anilist.co/anime/4898/), [Noir](https://anilist.co/anime/272/), [Tegami Bachi](https://anilist.co/anime/6444/) among many others.
Originating from [Studio Deen](https://anilist.co/studio/37/) where he studied under [Atsuko Nakajima](https://anilist.co/staff/102141/).

[Website](http://ryokunihiko.com/)

Started taking piano lessons at age of 5. Attended in medical college about 3 years. From 1984 to 1985 he worked in a Tokyo hospital. After that he moved back to musical career. In 1996 he made his first solo album “The Gate Of Dreams”. 1998 second album “Into the Light”. “ONLY HEAVEN KNOWS” in 1999. 4th album “Pan-O-Rama” 2001. 2004 5th solo album ECHOES. He also made sountracks to DEAD HEAT,Emma,The Twelve Kingdoms and many more.

STEREOPONY is a Japanese rock band that formed in Okinawa, Japan in 2008 consisting of NOHANA (Bass Guitar), AIMI (Lead Guitar/Lead Vocals), and SHIHO (Drums). Their song Hitohira no Hanabira (ヒトヒラのハナビラ) is the current ending theme for the anime series Bleach. Their first single was released on November 5, 2008. It ranked 25 on the Oricon Weekly Charts. They will be performing "Namida no Mukou (泪のムコウ)" as the second opening song for Mobile Suit Gundam 00 Second Season.

PIKO is a Japanese singer. He is a popular singer on Nico Nico Douga, a Japanese video sharing site. He is called a “Ryoseirui”, which means that he has the range and tone of both a male and female. He debuted as an indie singer in 2007 when he uploaded a cover of Hatsune Miku's Melt onto Nico Nico Douga. He signed with Ki/oon Records, a subsidary of Sony, in 2010 and will now face the challenge of being a major singer.
Known for his involvement in the [Naruto](https://anilist.co/anime/1735/) franchise.

Currently freelance he resides in Tokyo. Yoshioka is a member of the Writers' Guild of Japan and the Television and Radio Writers' Association of Japan.

[Website](http://www.takawo.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/takawoy) | [Twitter 2](https://twitter.com/takawoyy)
_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/254528/)._
Tsutomu Miyazawa is an animator, storyboard artist, character and mechanical designer formerly affiliated with [Studio Kikan](https://anilist.co/studio/256/).

He is an animator and character designer. Motohashi started working at Studio Z. Later, after leaving Studio Z, he started together with Hirayama Satoshi and Kamegaki Hajime Studio Z5. Today he is affiliated with Xebec and is the representative director of its subsidiary Xebec M2.
**Tomoko Fukunaga** is a Japanese animator and animation director.

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/julio.muzzi/)

Júlio Muzzi is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, dubbing director, and composer.

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/jhonnyferri/) | [Facebook](https://facebook.com/jhonny.ferridossantos) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@jhonny.ferri) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/jhonnyferri1515)

Jhonny Ferri dos Santos is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, dubbing director, and theater director.

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/brunorodrigues.ator/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/obrunoator) | [Facebook](https://facebook.com/100090623022348)

Bruno Rodrigues is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, and dubbing director.

[Instagram](https://Instagram.com/gustavoiglesias.ator/) | [Facebook](https://facebook.com/luizgustavo.valimiglesias)

Luiz Gustavo Valim Iglesias, better known as Gustavo Iglesias, is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, and dubbing director.
